pages.text: 76|6|(Soreha) arra no shimo be-tachi ga nomu izumi no koto de, ware wa omoinomamani konkonto (izumi o) waki dasa seru.
76|7|Kare-ra (zenkosha) wa chikai o hatashi, saiyaku no hirogaru hi o osorete iru.
76|8|Mata kare-ra wa, kare o keiai suru tame ni, hinja to minashigo to horyo ni shokumotsu o ataeru.
76|9|(Soshite iu. ) `Watashi-tachi wa, arra no o yorokobi o negatte, anata gata o yashinai, anata gata ni hoshu mo kansha mo motomemasen.
76|10|Watashi-tachi wa,-nushi no kuju ni michita o ikarinohi o osoremasu'.
76|11|Sorede arra wa, sonohi no saiyaku kara kare-ra o mamori, subarashi yorokobi o atae rareru.
76|12|Kare-ra ga taeshinondanode, kare wa rakuen to kinu (no i) de kare-ra ni mukuwa re,
76|13|sono (rakuen no)-chu de, nedoko no ue ni yuttari to mi o nobashi, kare-ra wa kokusho no taiyo mo, koru samuke mo oboenaidearou.
76|14|(Jumoku no) kokage wa kare-ra no ue o oi,(kajitsu no) bo wa tsutsumashiku tare kudaru.
76|15|Gin no mizusashi to garasuno-hai wa, kare-ra no ma ni mawasa reyou.
76|16|Garasu (no hai to mieta no) wa gin de tsukura rete ite, kare-ra wa konomi no ryo o sore ni mitasu.
76|17|Kare-ra wa soko de, shoga o mazeta hai no nomimono o atae rareyou.
76|18|Soko ni, sarusabiru to nadzuke rareru izumi ga aru.
76|19|Mata eien no shonen-tachi ga kare-ra no ma o 往米 Shi, anata ga kare-ra o miru to, maki chirasa reta shinjudearu to omoudearou.
76|20|Anata wa shisen o mukeru to shifuku no sodaina sangoku o shitatamerudearou.
76|21|Kare-ra wa utsukushi midoriiro no kinu to nishiki no soto i o matoi, gin no udewa de kazara re,-nushi wa kare-ra ni junryona nomimono o noma se rareru.
76|22|`Hontoni kore wa anata gata ni taisuru hoshodearu. Anata gata no doryoku ga uke haira reta nodearu.'(To ose rareyou).
76|23|Ware koso wa, dankai o o tte anata ni kuruan o kudashita monodearu.
76|24|Dakara (dendo ni sen'nen shi), anata no omo no shinpan o taeshinonde mate. Kare-ra no naka no tsumi aru mono ya, fushinjin-sha ni shitagatte wa naranai.
76|25|Asanayuna, anata no omo no gyomei o 唱念 Shi nasai.
